alert.note: Alert for Coffee; Dale; Geneva; Houston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 24 at 4:50PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Dale, southeastern Coffee, northeastern Geneva and northwestern Houston Counties through 530 PM CDT... At 449 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles south of Enterprise to near Hartford to Slocomb. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Daleville, Dothan, Enterprise, Fort Rucker, Ozark, Hartford, Taylor, Midland City, Level Plains, Slocomb, Newton, Pinckard, Malvern, Clayhatchee, Grimes, Napier Field, Coffee Springs, Hunt Field, Waterford and Gerald. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
